long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing TLDR.AI, your go-to tool for effortlessly summarising online articles. Say goodbye to information overload and hello to streamlined reading! With TLDR.AI, you can now quickly condense lengthy articles into concise and easily digestible summaries.

Simply navigate to the website you want summarised, click on the extension icon, wait a couple of seconds, and voilà – a fully summarised, quick-to-read summary.
